name: Morph (itch) (David'sFormula)
description:
Morph is a game where you the alien can shift shape into different objects to try and sneak, devour or survive against your enemies by getting to the end and through the large machine object.

How to play-

Controls; WASD for movement. The A key is used to move the player to the left. The D key is used to move the player to the right. The W key is used to move the player up a level and the S key is used to move the player down a level.

Right click is used to bring up the morph options which different enemies can and can't detect.

Left click is used to devour enemies for essence which is used to morph into different objects.

The C key is used to hide in cover inside the blue cylinder tanks.

Escape key for the menu.
